items.title: PAW Therapeutics Listed on Ministry of Science and Technology Website
items.summary: PAW Therapeutics project has been officially listed on the Ministry of Science and Technology website, marking the company's recognition and support from the government in the field of technological innovation.

items.title: Reverse Aging, Regeneration | Anti-aging New Drug Academic Symposium Successfully Concluded!
items.summary: PAW Therapeutics CEO Dr. Zhao Simiao was invited to participate in the anti-aging new drug academic symposium, introducing innovative achievements in anti-aging drug R&D from the perspective of AI big data learning technology.

items.title: PAW Therapeutics Wins Excellence Award at International Maker Competition UK Division
items.summary: At the International Maker Competition UK Division finals held in London, PAW Therapeutics stood out from over 80 innovative entrepreneurial projects, successfully winning the Excellence Award, demonstrating innovation strength in the biomedical field.

items.title: üêæ Pet DNA Methylation Aging Test Kit Officially Released
items.summary: We're proud to share a milestone from our mission's core: launching the Pet DNA Methylation Aging Test Kit. "PAW Therapeutics - Where Love Lives Longer". For the first time, pet parents can gain insights into physiological age based on science, not guesswork.

extraNews.title: PAW Therapeutics Listed on Ministry of Science and Technology Website
extraNews.summary: PAW Therapeutics project has been officially listed on the Ministry of Science and Technology website, marking national-level recognition of the company's innovation in science and technology and contribution to pet health technology development.

extraNews.title: AI-Driven Drug Screening Platform Achieves Major Breakthrough
extraNews.summary: Our AI drug screening platform has achieved a major breakthrough in identifying potential anti-aging compounds, improving screening efficiency by 300% and laying a solid foundation for subsequent drug development.

extraNews.title: Strategic Partnership Established with Leading Veterinary Hospitals
extraNews.summary: PAW Therapeutics has signed strategic cooperation agreements with multiple renowned veterinary hospitals to jointly advance pet health management innovation and provide scientific health services to more pet families.

extraNews.title: Important Research Paper Published: Cross-Species Aging Mechanism Study
extraNews.summary: Our research team published an important paper in Nature Aging journal, revealing similarities between humans and pets in aging mechanisms, providing theoretical foundation for cross-species drug development.

about.brandPromise: PAW Therapeutics, Where Love Lives Forever
about.poetic1: Using Science to Extend Life's Warmth

mission.title: Corporate Mission
mission.content: Through AI-driven cross-species longevity drug discovery platform, develop breakthrough drugs to extend the healthy lifespan of humans and pets, making every love last longer.

vision.title: Corporate Vision
vision.content: To become the world's leading cross-species longevity drug innovation company, building a beautiful future where humans and pets share healthy longevity, making science serve the continuation of life.

values.title: Core Values
values.content: Love as foundation, science as priority, innovation as soul, responsibility as weight. Uphold rigorous scientific attitude, pursue excellence in R&D quality, and shoulder social responsibility.

responsibility.title: Corporate Responsibility & Commitment
responsibility.subtitle: Advancing scientific progress responsibly to benefit society

ethics.content: Strictly adhere to scientific ethics, ensuring all research activities meet international ethical standards

sustainability.content: Committed to environmental protection and sustainable development, fulfilling corporate social responsibility

animalWelfare.content: Always put animal welfare first, promoting humanitarian scientific research

about.title: Love Lights Up Life, Science Extends Companionship
about.subtitle: PAW Therapeutics is dedicated to accelerating anti-aging drug development for pets and humans through AI technology, enabling every life to enjoy longer, healthier companionship.
about.description: Based on cutting-edge scientific technology, driven by globally leading R&D capabilities.
about.quote: Step by step, steadily advancing R&D, PAW Therapeutics is a team with dreams and love, bringing together top scholars from Oxford University, Imperial College, and UC Berkeley, and collaborating with Nobel Prize winners and industry experts to explore the boundaries of science together.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
items: Focus on internationally leading first-in-class drugs: concentrated on longevity drugs
Enable Chinese pet parents to access world-class new drugs as early as possible
Efficient resource integration to accelerate new drug market launch, strict quality control
Build the company into a leading enterprise in the domestic and international longevity drug industry

pipeline.subtitle: Focusing on canine longevity and aging disease treatment

paw001.name: PAW-001
paw001.description: IL11 inhibitor for delaying canine aging process and improving quality of life in elderly dogs

paw002.name: PAW-002
paw002.description: IGF-1 regulator for extending canine lifespan

paw003.name: PAW-003
paw003.description: TGF-Œ≤ inhibitor for treating canine fibrotic diseases and delaying aging

paw004.name: PAW-004
paw004.description: Innovative therapeutic drug for canine arthritis to improve joint health in elderly dogs

paw005.name: PAW-005
paw005.description: Innovative drug for canine pancreatitis to improve digestive system health in elderly dogs

missionStatement.text:
Focused on developing First-in-Class innovative drugs for both animals and humans,
committed to providing safe and effective longevity drugs globally,
using science to light up hope and extend warm companionship,
to become a global leader in the biomedical industry.

seniorBioinformatics.title: Senior Bioinformatics Engineer
seniorBioinformatics.description: Responsible for algorithm development and optimization of AI-driven cross-species longevity drug discovery platform

requirements.0: Master's degree or above in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related fields
requirements.1: 3+ years of experience in bioinformatics algorithm development
requirements.2: Proficient in Python, R and other programming languages
requirements.3: Experience with machine learning and deep learning projects
requirements.4: Excellent English reading and writing skills

responsibilities.0: Develop and optimize AI-driven drug discovery algorithms
responsibilities.1: Design cross-species biological data analysis workflows
responsibilities.2: Participate in core product technical architecture design
responsibilities.3: Collaborate with team to achieve project goals

drugChemistry.title: Drug Chemistry Researcher
drugChemistry.description: Lead drug chemistry research and drive innovative drug discovery and development

requirements.0: PhD in Organic Chemistry, Medicinal Chemistry or related fields
requirements.1: 5+ years of drug chemistry research experience
requirements.2: Familiar with drug design and synthesis methods
requirements.3: Experience in new drug R&D project management

responsibilities.0: Responsible for candidate drug design and synthesis
responsibilities.2: Participate in overall project planning and implementation

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: Responsible for overall product planning and market promotion, driving company business development

requirements.0: Bachelor's degree or above in Biomedical Sciences, Marketing or related fields
requirements.2: Familiar with biotechnology and pharmaceutical industry

responsibilities.0: Responsible for product planning and market strategy development
responsibilities.1: Coordinate work across R&D, marketing and other departments
responsibilities.2: Track industry trends and competitive dynamics

items.title: üêæ Pet DNA Methylation Aging Test Kit Officially Released
items.summary: We are proud to share a milestone from our mission's core: launching the Pet DNA Methylation Aging Test Kit. 'PAW Therapeutics‚ÄîMaking Love Last Longer.' For the first time, pet parents can gain science-based, not guesswork-based, biological age insights. We are applying the power of AI and molecular biology to help pets not just live longer, but live better.

informationCollection.title: 1. Information Collection
informationCollection.content: PAW Therapeutics ("we") is committed to protecting your privacy. The information we collect includes:
items: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number
Company Information: Company name, position, industry
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, access time
Usage Data: Website visit records, page browsing behavior

informationUsage.title: 2. Information Usage
informationUsage.content: We use the collected information for:
items: Providing and improving our products and services
Communicating with you, including responding to inquiries and sending updates
Analyzing website usage to optimize user experience
Complying with legal and regulatory requirements
Protecting our legitimate interests

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
In cooperation with our service providers (such as cloud storage, analytics tools)
To comply with laws, regulations, or government requirements
To protect our legitimate interests or security

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us through:
contact.address: Address: Paw Therapeutics Development (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.
contact.details: Room 502, 5F, Building 1, No. 6018 North Ring Road, Meilin Street, Futian District, Shenzhen
5F-502, Building 1, No. 6018 Beihuan Avenue, Meilin Street, Futian District, Shenzhen

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Welcome to the PAW Therapeutics official website. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please stop using this website.

websiteUsage.title: 2. Website Usage
websiteUsage.content: You may use this website for the following legitimate purposes:
items: Learning about our company, products and services
Obtaining technical information and industry insights
Contacting and communicating with us
Applying for positions or partnership opportunities
websiteUsage.restriction: You may not use this website for any illegal, harmful or inappropriate purposes.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
